SummaryEnglish: The Private Aichi Symbiosis Academy was originally a high school for high-class girls. When it became co-ed, the girls, out of fear, asked to be permitted to bring weapons to school. When that was enforced, a five-member vigilante corps-like organization called the "Supreme Five Swords" was also formed. After many generations, the five swords eventually became a group which corrected problematic students, and the academy started proactively accepting such students in order to correct them. Nomura Fudou was sent to this school after being part of a huge brawl. What will he do when the only options he has after enrolling are being expelled from that school or being corrected the way the rest of the male students there were...by being forced to dress and act like a girl!

1.TitleEnglish: Badump! A Pleasure Trip with All the Five Swords
1.SummaryEnglish: Nomura has conquered Kirukiru Amou, but the Five Swords, which should have kept the school in order, must now answer for their failure and learn from their mistakes. The head teacher of the Aichi Academy also quickly found the main problem of the five girls: each of them is so proud that they simply cannot work together! And to solve this problem, she now wants to send the five to an onsen department as part of a teambuilding exercise. Since they are allowed to choose exactly one other student to accompany them on the trip, Nomura is of course part of the party, but before he can splash around with the girls in a hot spring, he has to face an academic challenge after all the fighting and study hard ... Note: This is Episode 13.
Normura is transferred to a new school, and the Supreme Five Swords are more than ready to give him the welcoming tour.

2.SummaryEnglish: The Junior Five Swords take it upon themselves to get revenge on Nomura. Meanwhile, Rin gets an unexpected visit.

3.SummaryEnglish: Nomura gets on Mary's bad side after messing with Choka. Meanwhile, Rin is trying to get her own revenge.

4.SummaryEnglish: Rin and Mary have their eyes set on Nomura and are fighting for his affection. The only thing Warabi wants to do is take down Nomura!

5.SummaryEnglish: Warabi seeks revenge against Nomura, and she won't stop: even if it means going against Rin and Mary.

6.SummaryEnglish: Mary and Rin don't hold back in their battle against Nomura. In the meantime, Warabi has her own plans to set in motion.

7.SummaryEnglish: Satori sets her eyes on Nomura and isn't ready to let him off easily. In the meantime, Nomura tries to find a way out of Satori's clutches.

8.SummaryEnglish: Nomura is finally freed from Satori's grasp. With some help from the other swords, Rin and Nomura are able to open up to each other.

9.SummaryEnglish: When Amo catches wind of the little setup Satori did to Nomura, Amo challenges her. As the fight begins, Satori realizes that she's in way over her head.

10.SummaryEnglish: Satori and Amou's fight continues on the school's rooftop. Meanwhile, Nomura is challenged by Inaba in the courtyard.

11.TitleEnglish: The Magic Bullet I'll Always Remember
11.SummaryEnglish: Amou and Nomura's fight bring back memories of their past. Meanwhile, the girls are starting to put together the mystery that is Amou.

12.SummaryEnglish: As the battle continues, Nomura doesn't hold back, and someone seems to have a personal interest in the fight.
